full_summary:
**Title:** Low Profile Type 2 Ambulance
### Tender Details
#### Reference Number: PW-23-01020000
#### Solicitation Number: W6399-22LI06/A
#### Publication Date: 04 January 2023
#### Tender Closing Date: 10 February 2023 @ 14:00:00 EST
#### Consulting Entity: Department of National Defence

### Requirement
The Department of National Defence seeks to procure the supply and delivery of four (4) vehicles consisting of Low Profile Type 2 Ambulances. For the purpose of contingencies within the first twenty-four (24) months following contract award, optional quantities are available to the Department of National Defence.

### Notice Details
#### Notice Type: Request for Proposal
#### Procurement Method: Competitive - Open Bidding
#### Categories of Work: Trucks and Truck Tractors, Wheeled

### Eligibility Criteria
The procurement process is open to all interested vendors under applicable Canadian trade agreements and cross-country agreements.

### Tendering Information
To respond to this RFP, suppliers must complete and submit their respective bids electronically before the bid closing time of 14:00:00 EST on 10 February 2023. The bid must only be submitted via Megan.Buchanan@forces.gc.ca.

### Procurement Documents
To access the procurement documents, refer to the following link: [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/0c12b99090054df0042e91263a339822/w6399-22li06_a_request_for_proposal_eng.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/0c12b99090054df0042e91263a339822/w6399-22li06_a_request_for_proposal_eng.pdf) (English Official Language) and [https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/677a648dda760da4a7282bcffca0be6e/w6399-22li06_a_request_for_proposal_fr.pdf](https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2023/01/04/677a648dda760da4a7282bcffca0be6e/w6399-22li06_a_request_for_proposal_fr.pdf) (French Official Language).
